name: Action Resume
description:
Based on Double Fine's own story found at www.doublefine.com/jobs 

This ten-minute adventure takes you cross country to see what it's [not] really like to get a job at Double Fine Productions.

Navigate through dialogue trees before starting up the company bus/monster truck to hire that special someone.  

Then it all comes down to a FINAL BOSS INTERVIEW where you decide the fate of your fleeting digital likeness.
